items.text: How to delegate powerfully
What support are you looking for mainly?  Where else could you get support from?
I have my way, but it is not the only way.
I could offer a solution but I would like to see the team get up to speed themselves.
You are more in touch with the daily challenges of this project so …
I am keen to see you develop your capacity in this area.
What have you tried already?
What are your concerns about taking the next step?
How about you give it a go and let me know how you go?
Come back and present me with three solutions.
How to generate more accountability
Can you provide me a time frame for those outcomes please?
How would you like us to measure your success on this?
When can you have that finished by?
I am concerned this project won’t be on target, what are your expectations?
What is your understanding of what we have just discussed?
What are your top three priorities for the week? I would like to check in on Friday morning about progress please.
How would you like me to help you stay accountable for this?
What do you tend to do if you realize you are not coping? What could we do instead?
Lets send an update of progress to the rest of the team.
How to encourage more initiative in team members
I’m keen to hear your ideas.
I am excited to see what you can come up with.
What have you thought about so far?
Where do you do your best thinking?
What would enable you to get stuck into this project?
Where would you start on this?
Who else would you need to talk to?
What support do you need from me?
I am keen to see you take this project and drive it.
How to stretch people further
You are going great guns; I know you are capable of so much more too.
What do you think your next step-up will look like?
I think you are ready to take on more challenging projects
If you were to lead this group, how would you start?
What would hold you back from taking on the xxx project?
Lets explore your aspirations and see what next challenge we can throw your way!
You have become familiar with this work and I’d like to encourage you to take on more difficult challenges.
How to reinforce current budget constraints
What’s the biggest difference you could make with what you have got?
Is there a radical option for making things work?
What’s the most useful thing you have achieved within the current budget constraints?
What will you have to say no to, in order to meet the current budget?
How could you do more with less?
How to request fewer interruptions
text
I love how you keep me up to date with your thinking; Lets structure that into a regular meeting.
Who else can you talk to if you get stuck on anything?
I’m noticing you seem cautious to make decisions. What would enable you to charge ahead?
I’d like to hear about high-risk issues. Can you gather your ideas over the week and see if your thinking progresses before we talk again?
How to reinforce the vision/values
How does this work fit with the overall goal?
What is the ultimate outcome?
It is easy to get lost in these details, what is the vision we set?
Do we need to restate our vision or revisit it again?
What are the agreements we have made about this?
What does success look like in two years time?
How to encourage strategic thinking
You have got the details in great focus; What if were to step back a bit. What would we also see?
If you were the architect rather than the builder what would you be focusing on?
Can you give me a scan of the wider issues affecting this issue? What’s happening outside the organisation?
I want to zoom out for a bit. We have been in close-up too long…
Can we get a map of the whole territory, rather than just this piece?
What would you want to address if you were the board looking at this project?
If you look right across the organisation what issues stand out?
Do you know who the influencers are in the wider group?
If you were to speak to the shared goals of all our groups what would you say?
How to invite more creativity
If we were to break some rules, we could create something new. What rules might be superfluous?
If you were looking for a new edge to this business where would you start?
If the market dried up tomorrow what options have we got? Lets think beyond what we are doing now.
I want all the left of field ideas on this – just throw me some random thoughts…
If you were (Steve Jobs, a doctor, a football coach etc) how would you approach this?
How to build more confidence
What are you most pleased with in this project?
What did you in particular offer this project that made it successful?
I have been delighted with the results.
I think you are tougher on yourself than anyone else.
How have you celebrated these successes?
Have you had feedback from the team about this work? I imagine they have found it wonderful to work with you.
You deserve a medal for that!
Have you shared that success with others around here?
I want to promote this success, are you comfortable with that?
How to request push back and challenge from your team
I am keen to have another view of this…
If you were to play devils advocate what would you say?
If you were not trying to be polite what would you tell us?
What is a riskier view on this issue?
I am open to lots of different ideas – lets play for a little while in other ways of thinking about this…
If you were me where would you take this issue?
We seem to be in agreement on this, what might someone say to disagree?
I am aware of becoming defensive about this project, but I need your critique in the mix…
If you were chairman what questions would you be asking?
How to encourage better balance
What would enable you to take a break now?
We know these projects are never finished, when would be a good place to take a breather?
What do you think your team observes about you and how you work?
What are you doing to look after yourself and your resilience? We need you to be strong for the long run!
Now that the immediate demands are ticked off lets look at what can be paused for a short while.
How can you make sure your team and you can continue to work sustainably?
What do you know about yourself working on these big projects? What have you learnt to keep yourself thriving?
How to help shift stuckness
If you had to do just one thing on this issue what would it be?
It does seem intractable. Lets break things into chunks
If you were me what would you do?
It’s okay; leadership is about finding new possibilities. What might we be missing in our thinking?
What do you know for sure about this issue? Are there things that don’t feel stuck?
Have you had feedback from the team about this work? I imagine they have found it wonderful to work with you.
Lets go back to basics. What really matters the most here?
What has to be addressed immediately and what can we wait to work through?
On a scale of 1 to 10 where are you at now?
How to connect better with a difficult team member
I’ve been trying outa different tack lately – how is it working for you?
What part of our meetings is most helpful?
Lets take a break from these issues and talk about how we are working together.
Is there anything I have been doing that you have been struggling with?
What has changed in the way we approach our work/your work?
How effective have we been in achieving results and learning?
How could we improve the way we work together?
I am really interested in hearing your perspective.
